content.text:
# West Bengal Film Journalists' Association Award for Best Actress

| caption= The 2025 recipient: Rituparna Sengupta
|country=India|year2=2025|holder= Rituparna Sengupta for Ajogyo|holder_label=Most Recent Winner|awarded_for=Best Performance by an Actress in a Leading Role|presenter=West Bengal Film Journalists' Association}}
The '''West Bengal Film Journalists' Association Award for Best Actress in a Leading Role is given yearly by WBFJA as a part of its annual West Bengal Film Journalists' Association Awards for Bengali films, to recognise the female performer who has delivered an outstanding performance in a leading role.
